default_sms_msg: Welcome to {Service Name}! We're excited to have you, {Client Name}. Let's get started.
default_whatsapp_msg: Welcome aboard! Your enrollment is complete. Reach out if you need assistance, {Client Name}.
default_email_msg: Dear {Client Name}, thank you for enrolling with {Service Name}. We're here to help you succeed.

default_sms_msg: Your booking for {Service Name} on {Date} at {Time} is confirmed. See you soon!
default_whatsapp_msg: Hello! Your booking for {Service Name} is confirmed for {Date} at {Time}.
default_email_msg: Dear {Client Name}, your service booking for {Service Name} is scheduled for {Date} at {Time}. Thank you!

default_sms_msg: Reminder: Your appointment is scheduled for {Date} at {Time}. Please arrive on time.
default_whatsapp_msg: Hi {Client Name}, just a reminder about your appointment on {Date} at {Time}.
default_email_msg: Dear {Client Name}, this is a reminder for your appointment scheduled for {Date} at {Time}.

default_sms_msg: Your lab results are available. Please check your portal or contact us for details.
default_whatsapp_msg: Hi {Client Name}, your lab results are ready. Access them via {link} or contact us.
default_email_msg: Dear {Client Name}, your lab results are finalized. Log in to your portal or contact us to review them.

default_sms_msg: Payment of {Amount} for {Service Name} has been received. Thank you!
default_whatsapp_msg: We've received your payment of {Amount} for {Service Name}. Thank you!
default_email_msg: Dear {Client Name}, your payment of {Amount} for {Service Name} is processed. Thank you for your business.

default_sms_msg: Reminder: You have an outstanding balance of {Amount}. Please clear it by {Due Date}.
default_whatsapp_msg: Hi {Client Name}, you have an overdue balance of {Amount}. Please pay by {Due Date}.
default_email_msg: Dear {Client Name}, an outstanding balance of {Amount} is due. Please pay by {Due Date} to avoid service disruption.

default_sms_msg: We've updated our privacy policy. Review it here: {link}.
default_whatsapp_msg: Hi {Client Name}, updates were made to our privacy policy. Read details here: {link}.
default_email_msg: Dear {Client Name}, we've updated our privacy policy. Review changes here: {link}. Reach out with questions.

default_sms_msg: Your account information has been updated successfully. Contact us if this wasn't you.
default_whatsapp_msg: Hi {Client Name}, your account details were updated. Notify us if this wasn't you.
default_email_msg: Dear {Client Name}, your account info was updated. If unauthorized, contact us immediately.

default_sms_msg: Your authentication code is {Code}. It expires in {Time}.
default_whatsapp_msg: Hi {Client Name}, your authentication code is {Code}. Use it within {Time}.
default_email_msg: Dear {Client Name}, your authentication code is {Code}. If not requested, contact us.
